doc.title: F.E.A.R.: First Encounter Assault Recon: Extraction Point
doc.plot: The City is decimated by a gigantic blast. Your only way out of the city is a chopper which is crashed by the emaciated spirit of Alma. You and your two teammates survive the crash and must find a way out on foot. You manage to find your way to a church. The Replica's are frozen as a result of Paxton Fettel's elimination. Once you enter the church, you are encountered by Paxton's spirit who takes control of the Replica soldiers to continue is insidious plan of revenge from the grave. You must fight past Replica's and spirits of Alma's creation and get out of the city before you are torn asunder by the awesome force that is Alma.
